results.name: Arithmetic derivative of cubes: a(n) = 3*n^2*A003415(n).
link: Bruno Berselli, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
program: (MAGMA) Ad:=func<h | h*(&+[Factorisation(h)[i][2]/Factorisation(h)[i][1]: i in [1..#Factorisation(h)]])>; [0] cat [Ad(n^3): n in [2..40]]; // _Bruno Berselli_, Oct 22 2013
